body: It's now 2015 I'm posting this and what a year it s been ! But more to look forward to is that Staff Applications are opening in roughly 14 hours from this minute and I can't wait who will get in , I'm applying as well hope I see you guys there if any of us get it ! :) For those who did get it well done its a big achievement hope the interview goes well ! ;D

title: Finally it's come...
